it.unibo.lineFollower

Interface ILineFollowerController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateMachineLineFollowerController, MockPIDController, MockPIDControllerFinale, PIDLineFollowerController, PIDLineFollowerControllerFinale, StateMachineBiLineFollowerController, StateMachineMonoLineFollowerController

    public interface ILineFollowerController
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Active class that controls the robot with the aim of following a line. Extends runnable so it does it's computation and control in an indipendent thread.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setForward(boolean isForward)
      Sets if the robot move forward (true) or backward (false)

      Sets the speed at which the robot it's supposed to move
      void terminate()
      Stop the execution of the controller and terminates teh thread.
